---
title: "POWER QUERY CHALLENGE 333"
format: html
execute:
  warning: false
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(gt)

df <- read_xlsx('PQ_Challenge_333.xlsx',range = "A1:A4")

df |>
  separate_longer_delim(Data,', ') |>
  separate_longer_delim(Data,' ') |>
  mutate(Alpha = str_extract(Data,"[A-Z]")) |>
  fill(Alpha,.direction = "down") |>
  mutate(Data = as.numeric(str_remove_all(Data,"[A-Z]"))) |>
  summarise(Answer = sum(Data),.by = Alpha) |>
  adorn_totals() |>
  gt()

```
